feature_defs.trigger: when you finish a long rest
effects: Choose a land type (arid, polar, temperate, or tropical).
You always have the circle spells for that land type prepared (see table).
limits: You can change the land type after each long rest.

effects: You expend one use of Wild Shape to create a 10-foot-radius sphere within 60 feet.
Creatures of your choice in the sphere make a Constitution save against your spell save DC; on a failed save, a creature takes 2d6 necrotic damage (half on a success).
One creature of your choice in the sphere regains 2d6 hit points.
notes: saving throw DC formula noted in effects

effects: Once per long rest, you can cast one level 1+ spell prepared from your Circle Spells feature without expending a spell slot.
After a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots totaling up to half your druid level (round up); no slot can be level 6 or higher.
You are immune to the Poisoned condition.
You gain a resistance based on your current land choice (see table).
You expend one use of Wild Shape to create a 15-foot cube on the ground within 120 feet for 1 minute.
You and your allies in the cube gain half cover and your Natures Ward resistance.
As a bonus action, you can move the cube up to 60 feet.
limits: The cube ends early if you are Incapacitated or die.
